name: PEPSICO, INC.
description: PepsiCo is one of the world's leading food and beverage companies.
sampleDescriptions: Monitor potential changes to Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) rules in the Federal Farm Bill and H.R. 1625, the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018.
Monitor developments on pending trade investigations and negotiations, including the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and Section 232 tariffs and implementation.
Highlighted the company's sustainability commitments and global supply chain.
Educate Members of Congress about the importance of the food and beverage industry to the U.S. economy; discuss Food and Drug Administration intentional adulteration rule.
Discussed impact of H.R. 1, the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (P.L. 115-97).
Monitored Transportation, Housing and Urban Development appropriations; discuss modernizing truck safety and weight issues; monitor draft infrastructure proposals.
Educate Members of Congress about the importance of the food and beverage industry to the U.S. economy.

Monitor potential changes to Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) rules in the Federal Farm Bill (H.R. 2 / S. 3042, the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018); educate Members of Congress on childhood hunger issues.
Highlighted the company's sustainability commitments and global supply chain, including efforts to improve residential recycling programs and responsible supply chain.
Monitor potential changes to Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) rules in the Federal Farm Bill (H.R. 2 / S. 3042, the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018).
Discuss orange juice purchasing and product requirements.
Monitor transportation issues including modernizing truck safety and weight issues; monitor draft infrastructure proposals.
Monitor developments on pending trade investigations and negotiations, including the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA) and Section 232 tariffs and implementation.
Monitor potential changes to the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017 (TCJA).

Highlighted the company's sustainability commitments and global supply chain, including efforts to improve residential recycling programs and responsible supply chain; engaged with Congress on plastics and recycling bills, including the Save Our Seas 2.0 Act (S. 1982 / H.R. 3969).
Educate Members of Congress about the importance of the food and beverage industry to the U.S. economy; educate Members on issues related to S. 926 / H.R. 1961, the KOMBUCHA Act.
Monitored developments on H.R. 7120, the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act of 2020, and S.3985, the JUSTICE Act.
Monitor issues related to S. 926 / H.R. 1961, the KOMBUCHA Act.

Highlighted the company's sustainability commitments and global supply chain, including efforts to improve residential recycling programs and responsible supply chain; engaged with Congress on plastics and recycling bills, including the RECOVER Act (H.R. 5115).
Educate Members of Congress about the importance of the food and beverage industry to the U.S. economy; educate Members on the companys response to COVID-19.
